text.section: The Secretary shall require political subdivisions and grantees to set, subject to approval and modifications of the Secretary, charges for services that are provided by the political subdivisions or grantees and that are supported wholly or partly by State or federal funds administered by the Department.
Charges for services shall be set at least annually.
If the Secretary considers it to be in the best interest of the public health, the Secretary may designate specific services for which a charge may not be made.
